entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Antigonish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:50 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tracadie 04:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: -0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -1
Dewpoint: -4.9°C
Wind: W 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Rain mixed with freezing rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets late this morning. Rain or freezing rain beginning early this afternoon. Fog patches this afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow or freezing rain. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets changing to snow late this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming north 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 late in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 11 except minus 15 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 11 except minus 15 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023
